title: The Future of JavaScript Frameworks
description: A deep dive into the trends shaping the future of JavaScript frameworks, from reactivity to build tools.

title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
description: Learn best practices for designing and building scalable and maintainable APIs using Node.js and modern tooling.

title: CSS Grid and Flexbox: A Modern Approach
description: Master the art of layout in CSS. This talk covers both Grid and Flexbox, and when to use each.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
description: An introductory session on the fundamentals of Machine Learning using Python's most popular libraries.

title: DevOps for Developers: A Practical Guide
description: This talk demystifies DevOps, providing practical steps for developers to improve their deployment pipelines.

title: Web Accessibility: Building for Everyone
description: Learn the importance of web accessibility (a11y) and how to build inclusive websites that work for all users.
